remarks: Existential introduction, using implicit substitution.  Compare Lemma 14 of [Tarski] p. 70.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 10-Dec-2017.)
statement:
spimeh.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
spimeh.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
spimeh $p |- ( ph -> E. x ps ) $.
$d x y $.
